page.title: 16COMMERCE.
page.content: The other precinct is{Marston,}much smaller than{Headington,}but it contains many facilities such as a hairdresser's, a furniture store, a video hire shop and a veterinary surgeon. The general opinion is that you can live quite comfortably in Marston, but if you want luxuries, you must look elsewhere. Some people said they would like to see a{wet fish shop,}and one thought another{chemist}would be a good idea, but most people thought the facilities in Marston were good enough already. There are also a few shops by the {Green-Road Roundabout.}Here you will find another hairdresser's, a post office, a laundrette, a newsagents and a model shop. In our area there are 5 garages. The area has a wide range of shops, which are perfectly adequate for whatever it is you need.
